name: HELLBLASTER - Public Test Build
description:
THANK YOU FOR DOWNLOADING HELLBLASTER!

The game is currently in a tech demo phase, so there is technically no gameplay yet. All you can do is walk around, shoot aimlessly and pick up ammo.

BUT

There will eventually be a full game finished, so please stay tuned for that!

Thank you!!!!

-Blook

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD-Move

Mouse-Aim gun

Left mouse button-Fire gun

Space-Sprint
